component.name: StarryDex
component.summary: A simple Pokédex Application for the COSMIC™ desktop

description.p: Embark on your Pokémon journey with StarryDex, a simple Pokédex application.

ul.li: Browse detailed info on all Pokémon species, including stats, evolution requirements, and more.
Quickly search Pokémon by name, type, stats, and other filters.
Works offline after the initial setup is complete.
